articles.title: John Dillermand: Children's TV show about man with with giant penis airs - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Parents are slamming John Dillermand, after the first episode about a man's misbehaving genitalia went to air on the weekend.
articles.content:
Alright, this one is going to sound a bit weird but Denmark is kicking off 2021 with a childrens TV show about a man and his outrageously large and misbehaving penis.
Yes, you read that correctly.
